meeting_request.purpose: Struggling with depression and feeling lost after graduation
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Caroline, a senior Religious Studies major. Last semester was really tough — I struggled with depression and anxiety, and I’m still dealing with those issues now. I felt like everything was falling apart, and I felt like I was lost without a clear sense of purpose. I ended up taking a lot of classes that weren’t directly related to my major, and I ended up overloading with coursework and feeling overwhelmed. I started talking to friends and faculty about how I was feeling, but I didn’t realize how deep the depression was until I started feeling like I was losing control. I’m still trying to figure out what comes next, and I feel like I’m not alone in this. I want to talk to someone about how to get better and work on rebuilding my sense of self and direction.
